channel.title: CVE Feed for Plainware -- Locatoraid Store Locator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Plainware -- Locatoraid Store Locator

item.title: CVE-2024-30181|2024-03-27T11:39:22.535Z -- Plainware -- Locatoraid Store Locator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Plainware Locatoraid Store Locator allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Locatoraid Store Locator: from n/a through 3.9.30.
